main event: A group of boy scouts witnessed a fast-moving object in the sky while at a camp in Ten Mile River, New York, in 1953.
interesting points: The object was described as flying like a flying saucer making sharp right angle turns., The object was flying approximately 2,000 feet above the ground., Witnesses reported seeing it during sunset with falling stars also present., The witness theorized about the object's fuel and material properties, suggesting advanced technology., The report notes that the witness did not report the sighting until later in November 1952.
sighted object: a fast-moving object in the sky
location: Upper New York, New York, USA
witness description: a boy scout during a camp with other boys
